audioText: Cette ancienne bibliothèque contenait jadis les plus précieux manuscrits de l'Empire romain.
question: What did this ancient library once contain?
options: The most precious manuscripts of the Roman Empire
Religious documents from the Byzantine period
Military records from various ancient civilizations
explanation: The text states 'Cette ancienne bibliothèque contenait jadis les plus précieux manuscrits de l'Empire romain' - This ancient library once contained the most precious manuscripts of the Roman Empire. 'Jadis' means formerly/once upon a time, indicating something from the distant past.
